title: Holiday Inn Resort Kandooma Maldives Wins Gold at the AEC Culinary Challenge 2015Travelandtourworld.com
text:
Holiday Inn Resort Kandooma Maldives Wins Gold at the AEC Culinary Challenge 2015 Published on : Thursday, September 10, 2015
Holiday Inn Resort Kandooma Maldives is proud to announce that its culinary team won the prestigious “Gold Medal” from the recently concluded Asian Economy Countries (AEC) Culinary Challenge 2015 held at the Bangkok International Trade & Exhibition Centre (BITEC) last September 2-5, 2015 in Bangkok, Thailand.
Executive Chef Vincent Tan together with Chef Nguyen Truong Luat and Chef Truong Vinh Co representing the resort, participated in the competition which was themed “Inspire and Create the ASEAN Cuisines of Tomorrow”, organized by the Bangkok Exhibition Services Ltd., BES through its Food and Hotel Thailand (FHT) 2015 program, a premium international 5-star food and hospitality trade event in Thailand AEC Culinary Challenge 2015 was participated by 8 countries such as Cambodia, Indonesia, Myanmar, Malaysia, Philippines, Singapore, Thailand, and Vietnam.
Holiday Inn Resort® Kandooma Maldives represented Vietnam and turned out to be the competition’s grand winner by preparing, cooking, and presenting cuisines famous from the
seven competing nations. Thailand took home silver while Philippines, Cambodia, and Myanmar reaped the bronze award.
“The latest award our team received is another testimony of our dedication and passion to
outstanding culinary services we provide our guests and is a reflection of the hotel’s effort in creating Great Hotels Guests Love”, said Vincent Tan, Executive Chef of Holiday Inn Resort® Kandooma Maldives.
Meanwhile, Joseph Della Gatta, the Resort General Manager expressed his delight to the latest feat of the Culinary Team. “It’s my pleasure to be working with these talented people that the company really sees as its core assets. I’m really proud to be part of this award-winning family”, said Joseph.
Holiday Inn Resort® Kandooma Maldives’ Culinary Team are just flexing their muscles as they prepare for another challenge on September 18 – 21, 2015 where they will partake in the Maldives Culinary Challenge 2015.
Source:- Holiday Inn Resort
